com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium

Class SeleniumTestServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.servlet.WServlet
          • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde.TestServlet
            • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.SeleniumTestServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class SeleniumTestServlet
extends TestServlet
    An extension of TestServlet to use when running tests in Selenium.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
